attributes.action: introduce some form of registration log-in (email address?) on the petition web-site and reprogram it so that it immediately shows up when punters have already voted on the petition they are viewing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have to be many thousands of people viewing the petitions web-site who have no idea which petitions they have already signed up to - their name might appear, but it might not be them.  Other Forums on the web have a facility to indicate, on log-in, where a vote has already been lodged on a particular topic.  This extension to programming should be introduced on this VERY IMPORTANT web-site.

rejection.details: Feedback should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
